医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示食物抗原的抗肿瘤特性日本理化学研究所综合医学中心 (IMS) 的 Hiroshi Ohno 领导的研究人员发现，牛奶蛋白等食物抗原有助于防止肿瘤在我们的肠道（特别是小肠）中生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-reveals-anti-tumor-properties-of-food-antigens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-reveals-anti-tumor-properties-of-food-antigens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=750a263d-90bd-4b7b-b69c-5f045fece293 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:15:37 -0400 Study reveals anti-tumor properties of food antigens
裸盖菇素有望治疗抑郁症和改善健康实验性致幻药物裸盖菇素和标准 SSRI 抗抑郁药的直接比较显示，抑郁症状有类似的改善，但裸盖菇素还提供了额外的长期益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Psilocybin-shows-promise-for-treating-depression-and-improving-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Psilocybin-shows-promise-for-treating-depression-and-improving-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c46ee13f-7c25-438a-ac6f-77e01549eb02 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 23:59:02 -0400 Psilocybin shows promise for treating depression and improving well-being
微塑料无处不在！科学家呼吁全球迅速采取行动微塑料无处不在，但其对人类健康和生态系统的长期影响仍然未知。需要采取紧急国际行动来解决这一全球问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Micro Plastics-are-everywhere!-Scientists-call-for-swift-global-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Micro Plastics-are-everywhere!-Scientists-call-for-swift-global-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72251935-4147-497c-a957-7be936af3699 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 23:55:00 -0400 Microplastics are everywhere! Scientists call for swift global action
激素标志物预测酒精使用障碍的治疗反应一项新的研究揭示了影响酒精依赖（也称为酒精使用障碍）的荷尔蒙和生化因素，表明有酒精问题的男性和女性可能会从不同的治疗中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Hormonal-markers-predict-treatment-response-in-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Hormonal-markers-predict-treatment-response-in-alcohol-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08b5480e-55ff-4e44-808b-70c98a3ade6d Sun, 22 Sep 2024 23:48:57 -0400 Hormonal markers predict treatment response in alcohol use disorder
脑部扫描揭示 SSRI 使用与认知功能之间的联系研究人员发现 SSRI（选择性血清素再摄取抑制剂）抗抑郁药有可能改善某些认知功能，例如言语记忆。他们测量了患者服用 SSRI 艾司西酞普兰前后的大脑功能，并将其与大脑中一种血清素受体水平的下降以及治疗期间认知能力的改善联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Brain-scans-reveal-link- Between-SSRI-use-and-cognitive-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Brain-scans-reveal-link- Between-SSRI-use-and-cognitive-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bb0a6bd-c347-4ff3-a097-0b7517cc3cc9 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 23:43:36 -0400 Brain scans reveal link between SSRI use and cognitive function
尽管支出巨大，但美国卫生系统表现不佳，而澳大利亚和荷兰表现出色联邦基金最近的一份报告对 10 个国家的卫生系统进行了比较，显示尽管医疗保健支出较高，但美国总体排名垫底，但在健康结果、公平性和获得医疗服务的机会方面存在显着差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/US-health-system-underperforms-尽管-massive-spending-while-Australia-and-the-Netherlands-excel.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/US-health-system-underperforms-尽管-massive-spending-while-Australia-and-the-Netherlands-excel.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6287b399-0467-4fd8-b77a-59d920f52d45 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 23:09:00 -0400 U.S. health system underperforms despite massive spending, while Australia and the Netherlands excel
研究表明，怀孕期间的维生素 D 可以多年促进儿童骨骼健康研究人员研究了从 MAVIDOS 试验到童年后期骨矿物质密度改善的持续性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Vitamin-D-during-pregnancy-boosts-childhood-bone-health-for-years-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Vitamin-D-during-pregnancy-boosts-childhood-bone-health-for-years-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb4fda4a-2f97-42e7-9908-9d8feff11a50 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 22:24:00 -0400 Vitamin D during pregnancy boosts childhood bone health for years, study shows
首次癌症诊断时体重过重会增加患第二次癌症的风险最近的一项研究表明，首次诊断出癌症时体重超重的成年人患第二原发癌症的风险较高，尤其是与肥胖相关的癌症。该研究强调需要针对体重管理的生存指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Excess-body-weight-at-first-cancer-diagnosis-increases-risk-of-second-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Excess-body-weight-at-first-cancer-diagnosis-increases-risk-of-second-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e7cd212-9a03-4915-84ea-4358d0b9699b Sun, 22 Sep 2024 22:09:00 -0400 Excess body weight at first cancer diagnosis increases risk of second cancer
怀孕期间的地中海饮食可降低儿童肥胖风险怀孕期间采用地中海饮食可以降低儿童在两岁时超重或肥胖的可能性，并且该饮食组中没有出现肥胖病例。饮食对瘦素基因的影响可以解释这些效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Mediterranean-diet-during-pregnancy-reduces-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Mediterranean-diet-during-pregnancy-reduces-childhood-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40e10788-63ac-4d9a-b763-32bf2442f38d Sun, 22 Sep 2024 21:07:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet during pregnancy reduces childhood obesity risk
膳食抗原通过增强免疫 T 细胞来减少小肠癌研究表明，饮食抗原可以通过派尔氏集结激活 T 细胞来抑制小肠癌的发生。在无抗原饮食中添加牛血清白蛋白（BSA）或卵清蛋白（OVA）可以恢复小鼠的免疫功能并减少肿瘤生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Dietary-antigens-reduce-small-intestine-cancer-by-boosting-immune-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240922/Dietary-antigens-reduce-small-intestine-cancer-by-boosting-immune-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9b949f7-8781-4a49-af9f-a737cfc16ac2 Sun, 22 Sep 2024 20:57:00 -0400 Dietary antigens reduce small intestine cancer by boosting immune T-cells
